title: تجسس مدام گوگل و اسرار بر اینکه حتما باید از ایمیل من برای اتصال استفاده کنی
content: سلام خسته نباشید خوب من کم سرمایه ندارم گوگل میاد ایمیل خودش رو تو کانکت شدن هر نرم افزار تحمیل میکنه سیستم های اطلاعاتی داخل کشور گوگل رو به عنوان بزرگترین باگ اطلاعاتی برای شهروندان ایرانی شناسایی کرده تا به الان هم با کانکت بودیم مشغول تحقیقات بودیم چه باید کرد برای استفاده از گوشی به طور کلی سرویس گوگل رو کنار گذاشته و از ایمیل ملی اگر قابل قبول هست و يا حتي ایمیل هات میل و اوت لوک استفاده کنیم من از کشور ایرانم
creator: Captainrafiei

title: some directories missing after upgrade from 140 to 144
content: My windows 10 PCs are running ver 140 (and say they are running the latest ver and no updates are available, but my W11 Pc is running v144. When I try and copy profile from 140 to 144 about 1/3rd of the directories are missing. I usually do to this prior to going on a trip when I copy from desktop pc running W10 to laptop with W11. Last time I did this there were no problems as both were running v140, but now that the laptop upgraded itself to ver144 that's no longer possible as a third of the directories end up missing - things like Inbox, Trash, Drafts, Archive etc which are fairly important. I've paused all Thunderbird updates until the problem is resolved. Can you help please?
creator: mike741

title: I get frequent messages that connection to POP server was reset but at the same time, TB does d/l my messages
content: A search showed that others have experienced this same error message, but as far as I can tell, they all were unable to access their email. These messages began appearing about a month ago. They pop up in Troubleshooting Mode. They did not in Windows Safe Mode. AVG and ZoneAlarm are not the culprits.

Bedankt!
creator: Linuxrules

title: Dynamic adjustment to screen size
content:
Hi Guys,

I have found that Thunderbird fits my needs for a nice looking email client (i have tried them all). But one thing annoys me endlessly. I use Thunderbird on my Macbook and move it between using the laptop screen and attaching it to a dock with a 49" monitor.

Using Thunderbird on a 49" makes the UI almost unreadable. Then i have adjusted the "pixels" from -1.0 to 1.25 which then looks nice. Starting the macbook on its own build-in screen, makes the UI tiny again and i need to adjust the pixels to 2.25. But switching the pixel 2-3 times a days is very annoying.

Is there a way to do this dynamically? Is there a way to easily switch "profile" or should this be something for a feature request for the App to detect the screen resolution and adapt to that by a factor?
creator: stephan66

title: Postvak IN en - UIT enz. zijn verdwenen
content:
Beste mensen, goedemorgen,

In de SPAM-box kwamen steeds de frequente e-mails van de gemeente terecht: noreply@mijnafvalwijzer.nl. Om te proberen deze als gewenst aan te merken, verwijderde ik deze account door een knop met een rode prullenmand te activeren. Nu ziet de Thunderbird-startpagina er linksboven heel anders uit: Postvak IN en -UIT enz. zijn verdwenen, het adresboek is er nog wel. Op mijn iPhone zie ik nog wel de verzonden en binnengekomen e-mails.

Hoe krijg ik Thunderbird weer in de oorspronkelijke staat?

Met vriendelijke groet,

Jan Wind

title: cut-n-paste within Address Book
content: I've created a number of (corporate) Address Books, each with detailed information (postal addresses, phone numbers, etc). Often, I get a bounce-back message along the lines of '...please contact John Doe at JohnDoe@mail.com or Jane Doe at JohnDoe@mail.com.' I want to be able to select the original Address Book entry, and copy it to a new entry within the same Address Book, where I can then edit the 2 or 3 differences, instead of having to 1.) create it from scratch, or 2.) export, import, edit... Is there a simple way to just copy an entry to a new entry and let me edit it?? (ideally before saving, but, hey, beggars can't be choosers)

title: Folder Order Issues
content:
My folders are no longer in alphabetical order. Yesterday when I signed off for the day, everything was per usual without any issues. This morning when I logged in, I noticed I had one random folder out of order. I restarted the program and when it reopened, the top 250 or so folders were all out of order.

I have restarted a few times, confirmed I am using the latest version (144.0.1), tried repairing the main folder (they are all subfolders), tried clearing cache, tried the "reset folder order" option, compacted the folder, literally everything I could find, with no success.

I use Thunderbird for work and have a folder for each project, I haven't counted every single one, but it is realistically over 1000 folders in total, yet only the top 250 (starting at zero, goes back to normal at the letter D) are affected. It would take far too long to manually correct/re-sort each affected folder, especially when I'm not confident it won't happen again.

I attached a couple of reference photos, but don't want to risk disclosing sensitive information, so hopefully they are clear enough to see the issue.

I am a newer Thunderbird user (a little over a year) and have never had this issue before. Does anyone have any other ideas on possible solutions that I could try?

(also, I have the Thunderbird installed on a few other devices connected to the same account and verified those are normal, it's only my main PC that is affected at the moment)
creator: mwood3
